thread.title: Pregnant Beyoncé Danced Better Than You Ever Will In Her Grammys Performance
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyoncé Danced Better Than You Ever Will In Her Grammys Performance

author: Anna Menta
title: Pregnant Beyoncé Danced Better Than You Ever Will In Her Grammys Performance
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
Beyoncé just gave her 2017 Grammy Awards performance pregnant with twins , which means I am writing this article from beyond the grave. 
Seriously, you guys, I am dead after watching that. How is she real? 
The 35-year-old singer is nominated for nine Grammy Awards tonight for her visual album Lemonade , including Album, Record and Song of the Year. 
She’s picked up two wins for best music video for “Formation” and Best Urban Contemporary Album so far, but as far as I’m concerned, the live performance she gave won every award that has ever existed. Bey came out dressed in a long, golden gown and a crown that reaffirmed her status as the queen. I am SHOOK and she's Best Dressed #2017Grammys #Beyonce pic.twitter.com/vOitoR27S1 
— Tianna Jenkins (@HintOfMelanin) February 13, 2017 She started out with an ethereal pre-recorded segment. 
— The FADER (@thefader) February 13, 2017 Then she launched into “Love Drought,” complete with dance moves with CHAIRS. 
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 13, 2017 Not gonna lie, that chair move made me pretty nervous for those babies. i wish i could trust anything as much as Beyoncé trusted she wouldn't fall from that chair pic.twitter.com/IUndclPY7w 
But, of course, because she’s Bey, she slayed it. Finally, she brought the house down with a beautiful performance of her ballad “Sandcastles.” Beyoncé performing Sandcastles RT to save a life 
— Molly Alvine (@Pop_that_mollyy) February 13, 2017 Jay Z was obviously incredibly proud to be married to such royalty. Jay Z was all of us watching that Beyonce performance #GRAMMYs #beyonce @Beyonce pic.twitter.com/EXLB3cLdiC 
— Katie Corvino (@kTc0rvin0) February 13, 2017 And even Blue Ivy couldn’t hold back her smile for her mom. Blue Ivy's reaction to her mom @beyonce 's #GRAMMYs performance is TOO CUTE FOR WORDS pic.twitter.com/wbCA6qva12 
AND THAT’S HOW YOU SLAY A GRAMMYS PERFORMANCE WITH TWO BABIES INSIDE YOU. 
This whole religious experience was preceded by an introduction from Beyoncé’s mom, Tina Lawson. 
She said, 
What makes me most proud and why why I’m here tonight to introduce Beyoncé is the devotion and love I see in her for my daughter, and the way she has always expressed love to all of those around her. I believe she earned nine Grammy nominations for her Lemonade album because of all of that and more. It’s evident in her powerful words and music. 
Can you imagining raising your child and having the child turn into BEYONCÉ? 
Seriously, well done, Tina. Well done. Twitter in meltdown as Beyonce reveals she's expecting twins To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
